metadata.title: CVE-2020-12390 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Incorrect origin serialization of URLs with IPv6 addresses could lead to incorrect security checks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 76.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '76.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
